## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
boxplotInvestimentos = ggplot(data.frame(y = "Investimentos"), aes(y)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(ymin = min(prices), lower = quantile(prices, 0.25), middle = median(prices), upper = quantile(prices, 0.75), ymax = max(prices)), stat = "identity") +
  #coord_cartesian(ylim=c(min(prices), max(prices))) #+
  labs(title = "Boxplot de investimentos", x="") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 10))
boxplotInvestimentos
```
```{r}
ggsave("boxplotInvestimentos.png", boxplotInvestimentos, device="png")
```

```{r}
"escore padronizado"
"with max value"
Zi = (max(prices) - mean(prices)) / sd(prices)
Zi
"with min value"
Zi = (min(prices) - mean(prices)) / sd(prices)
Zi
```

```{r}
"Média de preços em milhões dos foguetes projetados"
prices = na.omit(rawData$Price)

"mean"
mean(prices)
"median"
median(prices)
"mode"
Mode(prices)

"amplitude total"
max(prices)-min(prices)
"Variancia"
var(prices)
"Desvio padrão"
sd(prices)

"coeficiente de variacao"
cv = sd(prices)/mean(prices)*100
cv

"min value"
min(prices)
"1 quantile"
quantile(prices, 0.25)
"3 quantile"
quantile(prices, 0.75)
"max value"
max(prices)
```

```{r}
boxplot(prices,outline=FALSE)
```

```{r}
"Assimetria de Pearson"
As = 3*(mean(prices) - median(prices))/sd(prices)
As
if (As > 0) {
  "Assimetria Positiva ou à esquerda"
} else if (As < 0) {
  "Assimetria Negativa ou à direita"
} else {
  "Distribuição Simétrica"
}
```

```{r}
"Coeficiente percentílico de curtose"
Cc = (quantile(prices, 0.75) - quantile(prices, 0.25)) / (2 * (quantile(prices, 0.9) - quantile(prices, 0.1)))
Cc
if (Cc > 0.263) {
  "Distribuição platicúrtica"
} else if (Cc < 0.263) {
  "Distribuição leptocúrtica"
} else {
  "Distribuição mesocúrtica"
}
```
